      • doCompare

        public static int doCompare(java.util.Date date1,
                            int hours,
                            int minutes)
        Compare two dates. One of the date is specified by "date1", the other date is on the same day with date1, but its hour and minutes are specified by integer "hours" and "minutes".
        Parameters:
        date1 -
        hours -
        minutes -
        Returns:
        if return value is larger than zero, date1 is later; else, date1 is earlier.
